content.en: Cache optimization: Researchers have been investigating various ways to improve performance and efficiency in computer systems. They have explored the use of smart cache management and scheduling algorithms, dynamic cache partitioning based on cache misses, adaptive resource partitioning algorithms, and cache line aware algorithm design, among others. These algorithms aim to optimize resource allocation, reduce contention for shared resources, and enhance cache efficiency, ultimately leading to better performance in multi-core and multi-threaded systems.
content.da: Cache-optimering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige måder at forbedre ydeevne og effektivitet i computersystemer. De har udforsket brugen af smart cache-styring og planlægningsalgoritmer, dynamisk cache-partitionering baseret på cache-misser, adaptive ressource-partitioneringsalgoritmer samt cache-linie-bevidst algorithmedesign, blandt andre. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at optimere ressourceallokering, reducere konkurrence om delte ressourcer og forbedre cache-effektivitet, hvilket i sidste ende fører til bedre ydeevne i multi-core og multi-threaded systemer.
